eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Connecticut; District of Columbia/Washington DC; Delaware; Florida; Georgia; Indiana; Kentucky; Massachusetts; Maryland; Maine; Michigan; North Carolina; New Hampshire; New Jersey; New York; Ohio; Pennsylvania; Rhode Island; South Carolina; Virginia; Vermont; West Virginia; at 09:01 AM ON JAN 26, 2026 Effective until 10:01 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
